basics.name: Gavin(Jialang) Zhang
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm software engineer who's capable of building desktop applications, web applications and embed applications from ground up idenpendently. Coding has been a hobby since I was in junior high school. Till this day I'm still very curious about new technology, and exited about building applications to satisfy business needs.

education.institution: City Univerisity of New York - Brooklyn College

work.summary: I worked in a backend team who build complex data pipeline to serve data for the porfolio management software in our buy-side trading platform AIM
work.name: Bloomberg L.P.

highlights: Specialize in fixed-income-related products' design and development(bonds, mortgage-backed securities, repo, and etc.)
Optimize back end asynchronous trade and other event processing
Analyze and solve yield, amortization, interest accrual and cash-flows-related calculation issues
Use Microsoft tech stack C#, MS SQL Server, .Net MVC, Entity Framework
work.summary: Participate in core development for SS&C's next-generation investment operations and accounting system - Singularity
work.name: SS&C Technologies

work.summary: Chimera is an internally managed, Residential Credit Hybrid Mortgage Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT). Founded in 2007, we strive to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns, using leverage, to our shareholders.
work.name: Chimera Investment Corporation
highlights: Integrated BlackRock’s Aladdin with SS&C’s CAMRA accounting system
Built SSRS reports and other business tools related to mortgage-backed-related financial products for internal users
built applications to process time series data, bank statements , and etc from different sources
Improved and maintained a job configuration system to automate daily processes
Built other small tools for bridging the software purchased from different vendors
